EmailTemplate.name: New York Approved Followup 1 --Custom-Jaime
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Guardant360 is New York Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello again.
I wanted to put this back on the top of your inbox. Guardant360 is now New York DOH approved.
Are you in need of sample collection kits? I can drop by at your convenience.
Enjoy the Holiday,
From: Jaime James Sent: Thursday, June 22, 2017 4:42 PM To: {!Contact.Name} Subject: Guardant360 is New York Approved
Hello,
Did you hear? The #1 ordered comprehensive liquid biopsy is now New York State Department of Health approved! That means you can order the Guardant360 assay for your advanced cancer patients without completing a DOH waiver.
Is your practice fully stocked with Guardant360 sample collection kits? I can drop by at your convenience with some fresh supplies and review our latest panel updates. When is the best day next week for a visit?
Jaime James Account Executive mobile: (631) 235-8289 jjames@guardanthealth.com
